tabs: the justification is that the purpose of the extension is to manage tabs - mainly create and read the urls from them
management: the justification is that the purpose of the extension is to manage tabs - mainly create and read the urls from them
clipboardRead: the justification is that the purpose of the extension is to manage tabs via clipboard - it allows the user to use the clipboard to open tabs from a user-provided list (via the clipboard)
clipboardWrite: the justification is that the purpose of the extension is to manage tabs via clipboard - it allows the user to copy a list of their opened tab urls to the clipboard
notifications: the justifications for the notifications permission is to provide a nice UI once the clipboard copying is done
